pullRequest.title: Re-implement the data model for Tinkerpop-based persistence layer
pullRequest.bodyText:
The changes:

The data model has been revised and reimplemented to support frames of Ferma / Tinkerpop-based persistence layer.
The implementation follows Row Data Gateway pattern and relies on composition of an entity and data gateway objects.

Related to #940
MERGE NOTES: this PR must be merged along with #3434 and #3435

nodes.bodyText: Why for we need builder API here(in all such files)? This class can be instantiated only inside constructor of FeatureToggles - so we can use it's constructor directly. It will simplify refactoring (idea can add arguments in all existing method call(constructor) call, but it can't do anything with the builder.

Why you prefer interface as the base for mapper? If it will be abstract class, it will allow restricting access to method that can be restricted (there is not too many such methods now, but they exists). Also in opposite to weird syntax hack (default methods in interfaces), code in methods of abstract classes are natural.
